content.question: The figure shows a clear hemispherical tank filled with water. Students are to experimentally determine the index of refraction of the water. The students shine a laser toward the flat top of the water at an angle <math alttext="theta sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, as shown. They measure the angle <math alttext="theta sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> of the reflected beam and the angle <math alttext="theta sub 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> of the refracted beam. Which of the following is the best graph for analyzing the data to determine the index of refraction of the water?

choices.label: Graph <math alttext="theta sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> as a function of <math alttext="theta sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, draw a best-fit line, and find the intercept of the line with the <math alttext="theta sub 2 axis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>-axis</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>.

Graph <math alttext="theta sub 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> as a function of <math alttext="theta sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, draw a best-fit line, and find the intercept of the line with the <math alttext="theta sub 3 axis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>-axis</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>.

Graph <math alttext="sine theta sub 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> as a function of <math alttext="sine theta sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, draw a best-fit line, and find the intercept of the line with the <math alttext="sine theta sub 3 axis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>-axis</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>.

Graph <math alttext="sine theta sub 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> as a function of <math alttext="sine theta sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, draw a best-fit line, and find the slope of the line.
